Description:
NFL CSR Onshore CIVIL RLICDUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESThe job holder is accountable for all technical and coordination activities in line with job dimensions during Phase 3.1 [NFL] project execution from end of FEED to CIVILS completion in RLIC:Defining, implementing, managing and following up all necessary scopes and procedures related to NFL CIVILS construction of manholes and duct backs for onshore cable termination at RLIC Land fall point [LFP], interconnection to Ooredoo systems facilities [cable pulling ad FO termination/splicing] in conjunction with the technical team for IOC technology requirements covering as a min ICSS / telecoms / IS / OT specialists both on project and in FOPS and in external CTRs
Identify/manage all technical interfaces / formal permissions from QE/RLIC and coordination aspects from RLIC Land fall point [LFP], interconnection to Ooredoo systems onward to NOC HQ within Phase 3.1 and NFL Packages at end of FEED and during project execution between EPC packages for NFL project,
Manage Contract on site for NOC
Scopes shall as a min cover all internal and external interfaces, schedule and budget with all parties during project execution in particular
Coordinate with other NOC entities during end of FEED and EPC execution,
Coordinate technical matters between Phase 3.1 contractors and package leads,
Coordinate with MP/Engineering for execution of FEED and EPC phases,
Technically direct all parties under your remit and when specialist inputs required
Prepare and follow-up PR/Audit sessions during Phase 3.1 NFL project execution
Deputize for Phase 3.1 NFL Package Manager upon request on project management matters during project execution
For delivery of high quality engineering dossier for FEED and future EPC phase,
Report and liaise with Phase 3.1 NFL Manager as neededSkills
Skills: Bachelorâ€™s Degree or Master in Engineering in relevant discipline (Civil)

EXPERIENCE:Professional Experience in Engineering / interface and Project Management (years): 10
Large spectrum of skill and competencies in various engineering disciplines and/or in Interface Management
Large spectrum of skill and competencies in various engineering disciplines and/or in Interface Management.
A good knowledge of Contractual matters would be necessary and a good knowledge of Well Head Platforms Projects and Operations would be a plus.
Languages: English mandatory
Knowledge of relevant codes and standards and PLIC/Ooredoo working practices
H2S OPITO and T-BOSIET trainings useful
